description: A minimal PostgreSQL startup and setup script that initializes, starts, and configures a PostgreSQL database, user, and permissions, and saves connection info and environment variables.

methods.name: pg_isready
methods.description: Checks if PostgreSQL server is ready to accept connections.

methods.name: psql
methods.description: PostgreSQL command-line client used for executing SQL commands.

methods.name: initdb
methods.description: Initializes a new PostgreSQL data directory.
